ca.mcgill.ecse211.poller

Class Poller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.poller.Poller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Poller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is the poller. It collects the data from the light sensors and ultrasonic sensors and passes these values to the ringDetector and USSensorData classes to have the values processed.
    Author:
    Edward Huang, Hugo Parent-Pothier, Sophie Deng

      • enableCorrection

        public void enableCorrection(boolean isEnabled)
        Toggles odometry correction
        Parameters:
        isEnabled - Turns line detection on if true, off if false

      • enableColourDetection

      • getPoller

        public static Poller getPoller()
                        throws PollerException,
                               OdometerExceptions
        Gets the one instance of the class
        Returns:
        the Poller
        Throws:
        PollerException - if more than one instance exists
        OdometerExceptions - if there was an error creating the poller

      • run

        public void run()
        Get the samples from the sensors and process the values. If odometry correction is on, it will pass the values to the OdometryCorrection class. If colour detection is on, it will pass the value to the Ring Detector class.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getLightSensorData

        public float getLightSensorData(Navigation.Side side,
                                boolean current)
        Get red value of specified sensor
        Parameters:
        side - The light sensor from which to get data from.
        current - True if the current reading is wanted, False if the past reading is wanted
        Returns:
        The value of the sensor reading

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()
        Get the filtered ultrasonic sensor reading.
        Returns:
        The filtered ultrasonic sensor reading.

      • getLastDistance

        public double getLastDistance()
        Get the previous filtered ultrasonic sensor reading from the sensorData class.
        Returns:
        The previous filtered ultrasonic sensor reading.
